reviews.text: We just can't recommend it highly enough. It was an absoulte gem of an experience. It may sound strange but we really did feel special here, we were very well looked after and taken care of.
reviews.title: Loved Casci--service was top notch

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from a fabulous 2 weeks in Italy and the 2 nights we spent in Florence at the Hotel Casci were definitely part of our great trip. I agree with many others posting about the Hotel Casci:
reviews.title: Fabulous Hotel experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1. Location is GREAT! 5 minutes walking to the Duomo and the Academia and San Marco. 10 minutes walking to the Uffizi, the Bargello, Ponte Vecchio, etc... The Central City Supermarket is right around the corner. Within a couple of blocks are lots of restaurant choices from self service cafeterias to traditional trattorias.
reviews.title: Paolo was awesome!...Pierre was cool, too!

likes.disliked: — very small bathroom and bed took up most of the space in the room

reviews.text: The Lombardi family will pamper you at this perfectly located, spotlessly clean hotel. It is an easy walk from the train station and the location is perfect for seeing the city sights. Excellent buffet breakfast. We had a triple that was quite large and comfortable. The rooms are simply furnished and decorated but you are probably not in Florence to stare at your hotel furnishings. If you will be spending your entire day in your room spend 400 euros per day and go elsewhere. Otherwise, do yourself a favor and stay here.
reviews.title: Excellent Value
Excellent 2 star
reviews.text: p.s. While in Florence try to dine at Il Latini. Great food and experience.
Very welcoming family run hotel. Very clean and well decorated. Great continental breakfast. Personnel always willing to help and very knowledgeable. Very close ( 5 mins walk)to city centre
reviews.title: Great Little Hotel
Everything is True
reviews.text: There's not really much I can add to the previous positive reviews of this great little hotel, except to echo them. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful, and really made us feel at home. Even before we arrived we had welcoming emails from them with detailed diretions of how to find the hotel from the railway station. Our room was great, and the bathroom - with separate bath and shower - was far above what we would expect from a 2-star. On our last day we had to leave very early because of flight timings, before breakfast, but the night porter sorted us out with juice, bread and jam and fresh coffee. There were a number of nice restaurants within a few minutes walk - would particularly recommend Zaza. A visit to the nearby food market is also worthwhile. We'd definitely stay here again, and recommend it highly to anyone looking for a friendly, central hotel which doesn't cost a fortune.

Everything you've read about the Hotel Casci is true! From the moment you arrive, you are made to feel welcome and part of the family. The hotel is excellently situated, literally just down the road from the cathedral and 10-15 minutes from the railway station. The rooms are very clean and a good size, and have everything you need, including a flat screen television. The breakfast is very good, with plenty of choice, and you eat in a delightful room. There is a free internet facility. But the best thing about this hotel is the staff, who cannot do enough to help you. On leaving, we were given a free 2007 Tuscany calendar, and bottles of water and orange. If you want to stay in central Florence, look no further.
reviews.title: Enjoyable Family Room , Great location

description: The Casci is a small family managed hotel located in an ancient palace right in the heart of Florence, just a few steps from the Duomo and the Accademia (David), within walking distance from all museums and sights. It can be easily reached from the main railway station and by car, too, with a valet garage nearby. All rooms have private bathroom, air conditioning, flat screen TV with DVD, free WI-FI, hairdryer, fridge and safety-box.
